plot: When Little Audrey wishes for the rain to go away and causes a devastating drought, she must appeal to the Rainmaker to make him relent.
title: Audrey the Rainmaker
plot_es: When Little Audrey wishes for the rain to go away and causes a devastating drought, she must appeal to the Rainmaker to make him relent.
plot_en: When Little Audrey wishes for the rain to go away and causes a devastating drought, she must appeal to the Rainmaker to make him relent.

cast.role: Man Looking for Water /              Flowers /              Raindrop
cast.name: Jack Mercer
